<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><controller_preset/><includes/><macroponent display_value="Default">946c4bf393d646104d95f55a7bba10b9</macroponent><name>input_9/value</name><preset/><required_translations>[
    
]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[/**
  * @param {params} params
  * @param {api} params.api
  * @param {TransformApiHelpers} params.helpers
  */
function evaluateProperty({api, helpers}) {
  console.log("=-=-=-=-=-=-=-")
  console.log(api)
  if(api.state.url_sysid != '-1'){    // 파라미터 있어
    //console.log("api.state")
    //console.log(api.data.glide_form_1.nowRecordFormBlob.formFields.formFieldValues.contract_company.displayValue)

    //api.setState("end_user_display", api.data.glide_form_1.nowRecordFormBlob.formFields.formFieldValues.contract_company.displayValue)
    //api.setState("end_user_sysid", api.data.glide_form_1.nowRecordFormBlob.formFields.formFieldValues.contract_company.value)
    // console.log(api.state)

    return api.data.glide_form_1.nowRecordFormBlob.formFieldValues.contract_company.displayValue
  }
  else{
    return api.state.end_user_display
  }

  
	return '';
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>lhyunseok@sorin.co.kr</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-05-31 03:17:40</sys_created_on><sys_id>2cdfe53c3bea0e10ec3cbf2a85e45ad1</sys_id><sys_mod_count>13</sys_mod_count><sys_name>input_9/value</sys_name><sys_package display_value="BPM" source="x_yergb_bpm">41c8a9e73b1e4a10ec3cbf2a85e45ab7</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="BPM">41c8a9e73b1e4a10ec3cbf2a85e45ab7</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_2cdfe53c3bea0e10ec3cbf2a85e45ad1</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>lhyunseok@sorin.co.kr</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-05-31 04:20:11</sys_updated_on><target>macroponent</target><type>transform</type></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>
